. For others that have the problem:
I switched current branch back to master to recreate my PRs based on master (not including other PRs), and then Android Studio 1.5.0 (released today) detected faulty project and offered to reload the project.
After reload, Gradle Sync failed due to error (exception posted below).
I re-synced, restarted AS, updated referenced Gradle in gradle-wrapper, nothing worked.
The solution:
Go to the Gradle-settings in Andoid Studio and switch from "Local Gradle installation" to "Gradle wrapper". The path for the local gradle installation references a Gradle-setup only existing on the dev-machine of Quinny898.
